page.title: 17FAWDON INDUSTRIAL ESTATE.
page.content: The industrial estate, situated South of the Metro line and North of Rowan Drive, is composed of three large complexes.{Rowntree Mackintosh}have a factory employing approx. 500 people making an assortment of confectionery items. Situated east of the Rowntree factory is{Sterling-Winthrop}an international drug company employing approximately 400 workers. This is the Group's fine chemical division. It makes the bulk pharmaceuticals which go to other Sterling-Winthrop companies at home and abroad to be manufactured into finished medicines. {Tyneside Printers}is the third concern on the site. The largest part of the business consists of printing on metal (tinplate and aluminium) for tins and lids, but also for other items such as battery cases and signs. The company employs about 250 people.
